TASK: Craft an item of type: gray_stained_glass
inventory=[{"type": "gray_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "gray_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 40, "index": 21}, {"type": "spruce_button", "quantity": 10, "index": 23}, {"type": "orange_dye", "quantity": 37, "index": 29}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 8, "index": 33}, {"type": "paper", "quantity": 61, "index": 38}]
thought: The glass needs to be placed in the crafting grid in a square pattern around the dye, so I will first place one piece of glass in the top left corner (slot 1)
Ok
act: move from slot 33 to slot 1 with quantity 1
